title: Panic at the CostCo, RIP America’s Butts 3.11.20
itunes:title: Panic at the CostCo, RIP America’s Butts 3.11.20
description:
In episode 587, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Veronica Kwiatkowski to discuss the Coachella reschedule, coronavirus updates, full surveillance app for kids, a new cleaning Quibi show, Taco Bell's new long shell, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. COACHELLA & STAGECOACH CORONAVIRUS PUTTING FESTIVALS ON HOLD ... Moving to Fall Dates
  2. Fox Host Trish Regan Goes on Batsh*t Rant Against ‘Coronavirus Impeachment Scam’
  3. In what sounds like a subtweet of the President, Tucker Carlson says leaders should stop telling people everything will be fine and start telling the truth
  4. Only 6,563 Americans have been tested for the coronavirus so far
  5. Secret Service faces unique challenge of protecting Trump from coronavirus exposure
  6. You Might Be Buying a Hand Sanitizer That Won’t Work for Coronavirus
  7. Surveillance Firm Banjo Used a Secret Company and Fake Apps to Scrape Social Media
  8. Quibi To Launch Cleaning Competition ‘Squeaky Clean’ In Latest Commission From Endemol Shine
  9. Taco Bell to launch longest shell ever, Triplelupa
  10. WATCH: Wu Lu - Habesha

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
